mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(ALARMNO) FROM ALARM WHERE ALARMRECEIVERNO = #{value} AND ALARMCHECK='N'

SELECT ALARMNO "alarmNo", ALARMTYPE "alarmType", ALARMRECEIVERNO "alarmReceiverNo", ALARMSENDERNO "alarmSenderNo", ALARMTIME "alarmTime", ALARMCHECK "alarmCheck", SERVICENO "serviceNo", HELPERNAME "helperName", CODENAME "codeName", CODEVALID "codeValid" FROM ALARM, CODE, HELPER WHERE ALARMTYPE=CODEID AND HELPERNO(+)=ALARMSENDERNO AND ALARMRECEIVERNO = #{value} AND CODEVALID ='Y' ORDER BY ALARMTIME DESC

SELECT ALARMNO "alarmNo", ALARMTYPE "alarmType", ALARMRECEIVERNO "alarmReceiverNo", ALARMSENDERNO "alarmSenderNo", ALARMTIME "alarmTime", ALARMCHECK "alarmCheck", SERVICENO "serviceNo", FAMILYNAME "familyName", CODENAME "codeName", CODEVALID "codeValid" FROM ALARM, CODE, FAMILY WHERE ALARMTYPE=CODEID AND familyNO(+)=ALARMSENDERNO AND ALARMRECEIVERNO = #{value} AND CODEVALID ='Y' ORDER BY ALARMTIME DESC

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ALARM(ALARMNO, ALARMTYPE, ALARMRECEIVERNO, ALARMSENDERNO, ALARMTIME, SERVICENO) VALUES(ALARM_SQ.NEXTVAL, #{alarmType}, #{alarmReceiverNo}, #{alarmSenderNo}, SYSDATE, #{serviceNo} null)
mapper.update: UPDATE ALARM SET ALARMCHECK='Y' WHERE ALARMRECEIVERNO = #{value} AND ALARMCHECK='N'
